verse.name: c1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Idiye anukula samayamu neeku gana rakshana dinamu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Aayana raakada bahu sameepamani vaakyamu vraasiyunnadi Vanchakula dushtakaryamulappudu bahiranga parachabadun{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Mathai iruvadi naalugava adyaayamu Marku badamoodunu Luka eruvadiyokata vadyayamu chuda mugimpu theliyun{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Yuddamulu bhuvi jaruguchu nunnavi daivachittamu jarugun Maranamula sankya hechchu chunnadi nagarulu vanikedunu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Devudu raagaa naakamu marunu bhoomi dahanamagunu Neellu samudramu linkipovu yesu thirigi raagan{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Visvasulandaru nilchuta nijamu devudesuni vaakyamu Velaleni rakshana kalgu saampadyamu samsayulaku ledu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Kaalamu vyardhamu cheyaku dharalo karmamu pattukonaku Paapamun prematho pattiyunchaku shaapamu kougalimpaku{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v7
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Halleluya padi yellaraku thelupa nellarato koodanu Twaragaa raabovu Yesunu sandhimpa aayaththa padumu vega{/lang-eng}
